'Subsidiary corporations are all entities (including structured entities) over which the Group'}, {'bbox': '474 784 1496 808', 'page': 67, 'content': 'has control. 'page': 67, 'content': 'leases are recognised in the statement of financial position as property, plant and equipment and'}, {'bbox': '394 965 1497 988', 'page': 67, 'content': 'finance lease liabilities respectively, at the inception of the leases based on the lower of the fair'}, {'bbox': '394 1001 1327 1024', 'page': 67, 'content': 'value of the leased assets and the present value of the minimum lease payments.'}, {'bbox': '396 1073 1497 1096', 'page': 67, 'content': 'Each lease payment is apportioned between the finance expense and the reduction of the'}, {'bbox': '395 1109 1496 1133', 'page': 67, 'content': 'outstanding lease liability. The finance expense is recognised in profit or loss on a basis that'}, {'bbox': '395 1145 1208 1168', 'page': 67, 'content': 'reflects a constant periodic rate of interest on the finance lease liability.'}, {'bbox': '316 1218 695 1242', 'page': 67, 'content': '(i1) Lessee — Operating leases'}, {'bbox': '396 1290 1497 1313', 'page': 67, 'content': 'Leases where substantially all risks and rewards incidental to ownership are retained by the lessor'}, {'bbox': '395 1326 1496 1350', 'page': 67, 'content': 'are classified as operating leases. Payments made under operating leases (net of any incentives'}, {'bbox': '395 1362 1496 1386', 'page': 67, 'content': 'received from the lessors) are recognised in profit or loss on a straight-Iine basis over the period'}, {'bbox': '395 1399 532 1417', 'page': 67, 'content': 'of the lease.'}, {'bbox': '395 1470 1297 1494', 'page': 67, 'content': 'Contingent rents are recognised as an expense to profit or loss when Incurred.'}, {'bbox': '237 1542 556 1566', 'page': 67, 'content': '2.19 Government grants'}, {'bbox': '316 1615 1496 1639', 'page': 67, 'content': 'Grants from the government are recognised as a receivable at their fair value when there is reasonable'}, {'bbox': '315 1651 1462 1675', 'page': 67, 'content': 'assurance that the grant will be received and the Group will comply with all the attached conditions.'}, {'bbox': '316 1723 1495 1747', 'page': 67, 'content': 'Government grants receivable are either recognised as income over the periods necessary to match them'}, {'bbox': '315 1760 1496 1783', 'page': 67, 'content': 'with the related costs which they are intended to compensate, on a systematic basis or offset against'}, {'bbox': '315 1796 739 1819', 'page': 67, 'content': 'the related expenses in profit or loss.'}, {'bbox': '316 1868 1391 1892', 'page': 67, 'content': 'Government grants relating to assets are deducted against the carrying amount of the assets'}, {'bbox': '236 1940 454 1959', 'page': 67, 'content': '2.20 Inventories'}, {'bbox': '317 2012 1496 2036', 'page': 67, 'content': 'Inventories are carried at the lower of cost and net realisable value Cost is determined using the weighted'}, {'bbox': '315 2049 1495 2072', 'page': 67, 'content': 'average method. The cost of finished goods and work-in-progress comprises raw materials, direct labour,'}, {'bbox': '315 2084 1496 2108', 'page': 67, 'content': 'other direct costs and related production overheads (based on normal operating capacity) but excludes'}, {'bbox': '316 2121 1495 2144', 'page': 67, 'content': 'borrowing costs. ﬁnancial difficulties of the debtor, the probability that the debtor will enter bankruptcy, and'}, {'bbox': '316 1471 1495 1494', 'page': 67, 'content': 'default or significant delay in payments are of FRS 109 replaces most of the guidance in FRS 89. FRS 109 retains the mixed'}, {'bbox': '237 1037 1496 1061', 'page': 67, 'content': 'measurement model and establishes three primary measurement categories for financial assets: amortised'}, {'bbox': '237 1073 1496 1097', 'page': 67, 'content': 'cost, fair value through Other Comprehensive Income (“OCI”) and fair value through Profit or Loss, The basis'}, {'bbox': '237 1109 1497 1132', 'page': 67, 'content': "0 classification depends on the entity's business model and the contractual cash flow characteristics of the"}, {'bbox': '236 1145 1495 1169', 'page': 67, 'content': 'financial asset. There will be no'}, {'bbox': '237 1578 1423 1602', 'page': 67, 'content': 'impact on the Group’s accounting for financial liabilities as the Group does not have any such liabilities.'}, {'bbox': '238 1651 1495 1675', 'page': 67, 'content': 'FRS 109 relaxes the requirements for hedge effectiveness by replacing the bright line hedge effectiveness tests.'}, {'bbox': '238 1688 1493 1711', 'page': 67, 'content': 'It requires an economic relationship between the hedged item and hedging instrument and for the ‘hedged ratio’'}, {'bbox': '236 1724 1496 1747', 'page': 67, 'content': 'to be the same as the one management actually use for risk management purposes. There will be no impact'}, {'bbox': '237 1759 1219 1783', 'page': 67, 'content': 'on the Group’s accounting as the Group does not have any such hedging instrument.'}, {'bbox': '236 1832 1495 1855', 'page': 67, 'content': 'There is now a new expected credit losses model that replaces the incurred loss impairment model used in'}, {'bbox': '238 1868 1496 1891', 'page': 67, 'content': 'FRS 89. It applies to financial assets classified at amortised cost, debt instruments measured at fair value'}, {'bbox': '236 1904 1495 1928', 'page': 67, 'content': 'through OCI, contract assets under FRS 115 Revenue from contracts with customers, lease receivables. loan'}, {'bbox': '237 1940 1496 1964', 'page': 67, 'content': 'commitments and certain financial guarantee contracts. While the Group has not yet undertaken a detailed'}, {'bbox': '237 1976 1497 1999', 'page': 67, 'content': 'assessment on how its impairment provisions would be affected by the new model, it may result in an earlier'}, {'bbox': '237 2012 551 2036', 'page': 67, 'content': 'recognition of credit losses.'}, {'bbox': '236 2085 1496 2108', 'page': 67, 'content': 'The new standard also introduces expanded disclosure requirements and changes in presentation. These are'}, {'bbox': '237 2121 1496 2144', 'page': 67, 'content': 'expected to change the nature and extent of the Group’s disclosures about its financial instruments particularly'}, {'bbox': '237 2157 884 2180', 'page': 67, 'content': 'in the financial year of the adoption of the new standard.'}, {'bbox': '177 145 206 166', 'page': 67, 'content': '92'}, {'bbox': '246 136 595 153', 'page': 67, 'content': '800 SUPER HOLDINGS LIMITED'}, {'bbox': '223 157 1653 160', 'page': 67, 'content': ''}, {'bbox': '246 171 454 186', 'page': 67, 'content': 'ANNUAL REPORT 2017'}, {'bbox': '161 287 1255 339', 'page': 67, 'content': 'NOTES TO THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS'}, {'bbox': '159 352 712 371', 'page': 67, 'content': 'FOR THE FINANCIAL YEAR ENDED 30 JUNE 2017'}, {'bbox': '158 459 186 478', 'page': 67, 'content': '33'}, {'bbox': '238 459 1095 482', 'page': 67, 'content': 'New or revised accounting standards and interpretations (Continued)'}, {'bbox': '238 532 807 551', 'page': 67, 'content': 'FRS 115 Revenue from Contracts and Customers'}, {'bbox': '236 554 808 557', 'page': 67, 'content': ''}, {'bbox': '236 604 1493 627', 'page': 67, 'content': 'This is the converged standard on revenue recognition. It replaces FRS11 Construction contracts,'}, {'bbox': '238 640 1496 663', 'page': 67, 'content': 'FRS 18 Revenue, and related interpretations. Revenue is recognised when a customer obtains control of a good'}, {'bbox': '237 676 1495 699', 'page': 67, 'content': 'or service A customer obtains control when it has the ability to direct the use of and obtain the benefits from'}, {'bbox': '236 712 1497 735', 'page': 67, 'content': 'the good or service. The core principle of FRS 115 is that an entity recognises revenue to depict the transfer'}, {'bbox': '237 749 1497 772', 'page': 67, 'content': 'of promised goods or services to customers in an amount that reflects the consideration to which the entity'}, {'bbox': '237 785 1496 808', 'page': 67, 'content': 'expects to be entitled in exchange for those goods or services. An entity recognises revenue in accordance'}, {'bbox': '236 821 866 844', 'page': 67, 'content': 'with that core principle by applying the following steps:'}, {'bbox': '236 892 798 916', 'page': 67, 'content': '— Step 1: Identify the contract(s) with a customer'}, {'bbox': '236 928 934 952', 'page': 67, 'content': '— Step 2: Identify the performance obligations in the contract'}, {'bbox': '236 965 710 988', 'page': 67, 'content': '7 Step 8: Determine the transaction price'}, {'bbox': '236 1001 1219 1025', 'page': 67, 'content': '7 Step 4: Allocate the transaction price to the performance obligations in the contract'}, {'bbox': '236 1037 1223 1061', 'page': 67, 'content': '7 Step 5: Recognise revenue when (or as) the entity satisfies a performance obligation'}, {'bbox': '238 1109 1498 1133', 'page': 67, 'content': 'FRS 115 also includes a cohesive set of disclosure requirements that will result in an entity providing users of'}, {'bbox': '236 1145 1495 1169', 'page': 67, 'content': 'financial statements with comprehensive information about the nature, amount, timing and uncertainty of revenue'}, {'bbox': '237 1182 990 1206', 'page': 67, 'content': 'and cash flows arising from the entity’s contracts with customers.'}, {'bbox': '238 1254 1495 1278', 'page': 67, 'content': "Management is currently assessing the effects of applying the new standard on the Group's financial statements"}, {'bbox': '238 1326 1231 1349', 'page': 67, 'content': 'FRS 116 Leases Illustrative Examples & Amendments to Guidance on Other Standards'}, {'bbox': '236 1348 1232 1352', 'page': 67, 'content': ''}, {'bbox': '238 1398 1495 1422', 'page': 67, 'content': 'FRS 116 will result in almost all leases being recognised on the balance sheet, as the distinction between'}, {'bbox': '237 1434 1496 1458', 'page': 67, 'content': 'operating and finance leases is removed. Under the new standard, an asset (the right to use the leased item)'}, {'bbox': '237 1471 1495 1494', 'page': 67, 'content': 'and a financial liability to pay rentals are recognised. The only exceptions are short-term and Iow-value leases.'}, {'bbox': '236 1507 866 1530', 'page': 67, 'content': 'The accounting for lessors will not change significantly.'}, {'bbox': '236 1578 1496 1602', 'page': 67, 'content': 'The standard will affect primarily the accounting for the Group’s operating leases. As at 30 June 2017, the'}, {'bbox': '237 1613 1496 1639', 'page': 67, 'content': 'Group has non-cancellable operating lease commitments of $8,783,000 (Note 28(b)). However, the Group has'}, {'bbox': '236 1652 1497 1675', 'page': 67, 'content': 'yet to determine to what extent these commitments will result in the recognition of an asset and a liability for'}, {'bbox': '236 1687 1275 1711', 'page': 67, 'content': 'future payments and how this will affect the Group’s profit and classification of cash flows.'}, {'bbox': '237 1759 1497 1783', 'page': 67, 'content': 'Some of the commitments may be covered by the exception for short-term and Iow-value leases and some'}, {'bbox': '237 1795 1239 1819', 'page': 67, 'content': 'commitments may relate to arrangements that will not qualify as leases under FRS 116.'}, {'bbox': '0 157 1434 160', 'page': 67, 'content': ''}, {'bbox': '1065 136 1479 166', 'page': 67, 'content': '800 SUPER HOLDINGS LIMITED 93'}, {'bbox': '1206 171 1414 186', 'page': 67, 'content': 'ANNUAL REPORT 2017'}, {'bbox': '161 287 1255 339', 'page': 67, 'content': 'NOTES TO THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS'}, {'bbox': '159 352 712 371', 'page': 67, 'content': 'FOR THE FINANCIAL YEAR ENDED 30 JUNE 2017'}, {'bbox': '158 459 186 478', 'page': 67, 'content': '33'}, {'bbox': '158 1146 186 1164', 'page': 67, 'content': '34'}, {'bbox': '238 459 1095 482', 'page': 67, 'content': 'New or revised accounting standards and interpretations (Continued)'}, {'bbox': '238 532 543 556', 'page': 67, 'content': 'IFRS Convergence in 2018'}, {'bbox': '237 604 1496 627', 'page': 67, 'content': 'Singapore-incorporated companies listed on the SGX-ST will be required to apply a new Singapore financial'}, {'bbox': '237 640 1496 663', 'page': 67, 'content': 'reporting framework that is identical to the international Financial Reporting Standards (“|FRS) for annual'}, {'bbox': '237 676 1496 699', 'page': 67, 'content': 'periods beginning on or after 1 January 2018.
